work.name: Portable EMR Solutions Inc.
work.summary: Worked as fullstack engineer for electronic health record aggregation app.
highlights: Used Angular to implement OAuth 2.0 for integration with 500+ health providers.
Leveraged TypeScript with AWS Lambda, SQS, and RDS for robust FHIR data parsing, storage, and retrieval.
Refurbished mobile app using React Native, with a focus on 508 accessibility compliance.

work.name: HPC-AI Technology Inc.
work.summary: Worked on accelerating AlphaFold 2.0 inference workflow.
highlights: Sped up the inference of AlphaFold 2 by 200% by parallelizing sequence processing operations with Ray Workflow.
Created a parallel framework to construct AlphaFold 2 inference workflows, based on AI scaling framework Ray.

work.name: High Performance Computing Center, SJTU
work.summary: Involved in development of large-scale, distributed Approximate Nearest Neighbor Search (ANNS) system.
highlights: Achieved memory compression rate of 70% using Compressed Sparse Row format and k-bit integer coding.

projects.name: Group-based Social Network Web App
projects.summary: Created Ginger, a group-based social network application using the MERN web development technology stack.

projects.name: Steam Reviews Analytics Web App
projects.summary: Implemented a web app that allows users to browse, filter, and view statistics of Steam video game reviews.

projects.name: Anime4K-WebGPU: Real-Time Video Upscaling
projects.summary: Ported Anime4K to WebGPU, featuring cross-platform, client-side anime upscaling with hardware acceleration.

projects.name: Cloud-based Email and Storage Platform
projects.summary: Built PennCloud using POSIX C++, featuring cloud-based, distributed system for email service, storage service, and user management.

projects.name: Distributed Data Analytics and Search Engine Framework
projects.summary: Implemented BobaSearch, a search engine backed by distributed hash tables, MapReduce, PageRank and TF-IDF.

publications.name: Understand the Specific Regio- and Enantioselectivity of Fluostatin Conjugation in the Post-Biosynthesis
publications.summary: Understanding the unusual regio- and enantioselectivities in C-C bond formation in fluostatins coupling reactions.
